text: A Mandarin Chinese passage about artificial intelligence (人工智能).人工智能是当代社会最有益的助手之一。可能你对这个名词还不是很理解，或者觉得这个名词高大上。我给你举个最简单的例子，你可以随时对着自己的智能水壶说，为我煮咖啡。它就会开始为你准备咖啡了。科技真是为人们的生活带来了很大帮助。In modern society, artificial intelligence is one of the most helpful assistants.Maybe you don’t understand the term well, or think the term is too lofty. I will give you the simplest example. You can say to your smart kettle “make coffee for me”. It will start to prepare coffee for you.Technology is really helping people’s lives.1 – 人工智能对大家有帮助吗？2 – 当你使用智能水壶煮咖啡的时候，你需要做些什么？a. 走到智能水壶那，自己煮c. 对智能水壶说，为我煮咖啡Review frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
